scripts.docker:build: node -r dotenv/config -e "require('child_process').execSync('docker build --build-arg DB_PASSWORD=' + process.env.DB_PASSWORD + ' --build-arg DB_NAME=' + process.env.DB_NAME + ' --build-arg DB_USERNAME=' + process.env.DB_USERNAME + ' --build-arg DB_PORT=' + process.env.DB_PORT + ' -t protravka-mysql:latest .', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.docker:push: docker login && docker tag protravka-mysql:latest ivanslepchenko/protravka-mysql:latest && docker push ivanslepchenko/protravka-mysql:latest
scripts.docker:run: node -r dotenv/config -e "require('child_process').execSync('docker rm -f protravka-mysql || true && docker run --name protravka-mysql -d -p ' + process.env.DB_PORT + ':' + process.env.DB_PORT + ' protravka-mysql', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.docker:watch: nodemon --watch Dockerfile --watch .env --exec "npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push && npm run docker:run"
